title: Company Formation & Governance - General Incorporation Documents
content: General incorporation documents including Articles of Association (AoA), Memorandum of Association (MoA), Registers, Ultimate Beneficial Ownership (UBO) details, and Board Resolutions.

title: Company Formation - Resolution for Incorporation (LTD - Multiple Shareholders)
content: Template for resolution for incorporation of Limited companies with multiple shareholders.

title: Company Formation & Compliance - Incorporation, SPV, LLC, Other Forms & Templates
content: Guidance and templates covering incorporation for Special Purpose Vehicles (SPV), Limited Liability Companies (LLC), and other corporate forms.

title: Policy & Guidance - Legal Framework, Templates, Policy Statements
content: Collection of ADGM legal framework documents, policy statements, and standard templates.

title: ADGM Company Set-up Checklist – Company Setup (Various Entities)
content: Checklist for company setup procedures applicable to various entities within ADGM.

title: ADGM Company Set-up Checklist – Private Company Limited
content: Checklist tailored for Private Company Limited by Guarantee (non-financial services) setup.

title: Employment & HR - Standard Employment Contract Template (2024 update)
content: Latest standard employment contract template as updated in 2024.

title: Employment & HR - Standard Employment Contract Template (2019 short version)
content: Short version of the standard employment contract template from 2019.

title: Data Protection - Appropriate Policy Document Template
content: Template document for data protection policies appropriate for ADGM registered entities.

title: Compliance & Filings - Annual Accounts & Filings
content: Information on obligations of ADGM registered entities for annual filings and accounts.

title: Letters/Permits - Application for Official Letters & Permits
content: Procedures and forms for applying for official letters and permits within ADGM.

title: Regulatory Guidance - Incorporation Package, Filings, Templates
content: Guidance and regulatory templates related to company incorporation and filings.

title: Regulatory Template - Shareholder Resolution – Amendment of Articles
content: Template for shareholder resolution for amendment of articles of association.
